articles.author: Omar Sohail
articles.title: iPhone 18 Camera Upgrade May Include A Variable Aperture For The Primary Unit, With Apple Reportedly Obtaining These Parts From A Different Supplier - Wccftech
articles.description: Apple could introduce variable aperture technology for the first time in the iPhone 18, as another supplier may be included in this deal
articles.content: Apple finally included a telephoto lens in its iPhone 15 Pro Max last year, with the upgrade extended to the iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max. This is just one of the many examples of how the Cupe… [+2436 chars]
